verses.name: Mark 16:8
verses.text: And they went out quickly, and fled from the sepulchre; for they trembled and were amazed: neither said they any thing to any man; for they were afraid.

verses.name: Mark 16:9
verses.text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, out of whom he had cast seven devils.

verses.name: Mark 16:10
verses.text: And she went and told them that had been with him, as they mourned and wept.

verses.name: Mark 16:11
verses.text: And they, when they had heard that he was alive, and had been seen of her, believed not.
